title: Novochigol'skie kurgan
description: Cemetery site located on the banks of the Chigla River, near the modern village of Novaya Chigla, Voronezh Oblast. The site contains 28 burials associated with the Srubnaya Culture (Late Bronze Age 1900-1200 BCE) and the Sarmatians (1st-2nd centuries CE).

properties.description: Point representing the approximate Google Earth centerpoint of the largest kurgan group in the Novochigolskiy Kurgan site, after Berezutskiy 2021.
properties.title: Imagery location of Novochigolskiy kurgan
